cases.title: Mechanical Engineering Expert Witness Not Allow to Testify on Alleged Ladder Defect
cases.description: Plaintiff's Mechanical Engineering Expert Witness was not allowed to testify on the safety of a ladder as he did not have the requisite experience involving ladders.

cases.title: Post Traumatic Stress Disorder Expert Witness Testimony Allowed
cases.description: The court allowed Defendant's Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Expert Witness to testify regarding a firefighter's alleged inability to work.

cases.title: US District Court Limits Testimony of Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness
cases.description: The US District Court (Northern District of Oklahoma) limited the testimony of plaintiff's Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness on the issue of driver conduct.
